commando.execute.title: Commando: Execute command
commando.configuration.title: Commando Configuration
commando.configuration.autoClear.title: Auto clear
commando.configuration.autoClear.descrip: If true, automatically clear the output channel or terminal before each command.
commando.configuration.autoFocus.title: Auto focus
commando.configuration.autoFocus.descrip: If true, automatically focus the output channel or terminal before each command.
commando.configuration.executeInTerminal: If true, execute commands in terminal. Otherwise, execute commands on background and show the result in output channel.
commando.configuration.windowName.title: Window name
commando.configuration.windowName.descri: The name of the output channel or terminal. You can use placeholders.
commando.configuration.shell.title: Shell
commando.configuration.shell.description: The shell to use for running commands. If empty, the default shell is used. This setting is only available when executeInTerminal is false.
commando.configuration.showInStatusBar.d: If true, show the commando status bar item. Default: false
commando.configuration.commands.title: Commands
commando.configuration.commands.descript: The list of commands to execute.
commando.configuration.commands.item.nam: The name of the command. This is used to identify the command. This must be unique.
commando.configuration.commands.item.des: The description of the command. This is used to show the command in the command palette.
commando.configuration.commands.item.cmd: The command to execute. You can use placeholders.
commando.configuration.commands.item.aut: If true, automatically clear the output channel or terminal before each command. If null, use the value of commando.autoClear.
If true, automatically focus the output channel or terminal before each command. If null, use the value of commando.autoFocus.
commando.configuration.commands.item.exe: If true, execute commands in terminal. Otherwise, execute commands on background and show the result in output channel. If null, use the value of commando.executeInTerminal.
commando.configuration.commands.item.she: The shell to use for running commands. If empty, the default shell is used. This setting is only available when executeInTerminal is false. If null, use the value of commando.shell.
commando.configuration.commands.item.win: The name of the output channel or terminal. You can use placeholders. If null, use the value of commando.windowName.
commando.configuration.commands.item.exe: Execute on save file regex pattern
The regex pattern of the file to execute the command on save. If null or empty string, the command is not executed on save
commando.configuration.commands.item.gro: The group name of the command. If null or empty string, the command is not grouped.
commando.error.valueForKeyNotFound: Value for ${key} not found in object
The keybindings configuration is invalid.
Please add the "name" property to the "args" object.
